src.DeepLearning package

Submodules

src.DeepLearning.embedding module

Author: Alpha Team Group Project Date: March 2023 Purpose: Deep learning embedding module contains functions for deep learning embedding

class src.DeepLearning.embedding.GAT(num_features, hidden_dim, embed_dim)[source]

Bases: Module

Graph Attention Network

forward(data)[source]

Defines the computation performed at every call.

Should be overridden by all subclasses.

Note

Although the recipe for forward pass needs to be defined within this function, one should call the Module instance afterwards instead of this since the former takes care of running the registered hooks while the latter silently ignores them.

forward(data)[source]

Defines the computation performed at every call.

Should be overridden by all subclasses.

Note

Although the recipe for forward pass needs to be defined within this function, one should call the Module instance afterwards instead of this since the former takes care of running the registered hooks while the latter silently ignores them.

src.DeepLearning.embedding.contrastive_loss(embeddings, positive_pairs, negative_pairs, margin=1.0)[source]
Function:

Contrastive loss function for unsupervised learning

Parameters:

  • embeddings (torch.Tensor) – embeddings

  • positive_pairs (torch.Tensor) – positive pairs

  • negative_pairs (torch.Tensor) – negative pairs

  • margin (float) – margin

Returns:

loss

Return type:

torch.Tensor
